channel.title: How do I open CLASS files?
channel.description:
Hey i searched it on the search engine but nothing shows up...
Whenever i try to open a CLASS file it says:
Windows cannot open this file:
Use the web service to find the appropriate program or Select a program from a list
what do i do? nothing seems to work, and i need to open it to add customs/ect. thanks

item.title: How do I open CLASS files?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Don’t edit .class files

Those are edited automatically by the compiler.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I open CLASS files?

item.title: How do I open CLASS files?
item.dc:creator: @x_sam_x1 x sam x
item.description:
@x_sam_x1 wrote:

Yes you arnt supposed to open them, but if you really must just click Select a program from a list and click notepad or something.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I open CLASS files?

item.title: How do I open CLASS files?
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

you aren’t meant to open .class files .class files are compiled files of .java you are meant to edit .java files and then compile them and then you get class files out of that if you need help just ask I see that you are quite new here

Read full topic
item.source: How do I open CLASS files?

item.title: How do I open CLASS files?
item.dc:creator: @ollie123 Ollie123
item.description:
@ollie123 wrote:

You need to download Java and then run it from the command line.
